snippet.title: The Mildew Children — Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The free prologue will be released on Steam at the end of 2023. You'll find links to our social networks, as well as Steam page, in the pinned comment.

About the game: 
The Mildew Children is an interactive 2D adventure with elements of a visual novel. It's a dark story about a village inhabited only by children, who follow savage elder traditions. The main character Kyrphel is a witch. Along with her sisters, she tries to save the village from extinction by performing a dreadful Ritual, during which witches often die - since not everyone is able to prevail over the Mistress of Death.

#TheMildewChildren #indiegame #indiegames #indiegamedev #videogames
